This just started happening about a week ago, apparently with an update. The app will say I burned 5000 calories through 'light activity' completely out of nowhere. Last week it said 3000 calories had been burned through light activity at 9:30am, having done nothing but go to work. I reset everything, including my galaxy active and it worked normally for a few days and just started up with same issue again.

have used it for years. this last updated really smells like they are writing out old phones,like my s8. my phone is not rooted. have tried everything I have found to resolve it I think I am done. update: to fix the rooted error they had me clear me phones cache under settings. it started working. well a month later and it is giving me the same error. come on samsung..no calls. fix your app. period.

I still think the water unit should be adjustable I dont have a cup that messures 8.4 oz. i have a 8 oz cup, a 10 oz cup, a 12 oz cup. Water bottles normally come in 16.9 oz.

Uninstalled this app for the 3rd time only bc it keeps telling me I can't open it bc my phone is "rooted". My phone is not rooted. I used this app daily and only started having problems these last 4 months. FIX IT PLEASE.
not satisfy
its a bit slow and glitchy when adding foods, but the ads arent too annoying and its helping me reach my fitness goals
Overall it's a great app but sometimes choosing the correct food is a little complicated.

It has become slow and laggy. It used to be fast and to the point but now is cluttered with ads and useless stuff. Besides it gives stupid warnings about saturated fat, sodium, etc. Promotes eating carbs. Have a little variety, there's people who follow low carb way of eating and saturated fat or sodium is not a real concern for us. I'm researching what other apps can keep track of my macros in a more proper way and I will uninstall this for good.

had a frustrating couple of days where nothing was syncing and then I couldn't log in, but now things are working again. good app, just wish it was easier to see total calories burned (both active and passive).
I only use the calorie counter and it's great.
Helped me lose 2 stone and maintain my weight loss
no longer works wont let log in or create new account re downloaded and same issue
has some glitches.
üòî bad exp, tried with 2 different id's always show ... cannont connect to server... ... ...

Bait and Switch. the free app does what it is advertised to do. However, I purchased the premium plan and after about a week of using it, paired with my fit bit, it stopped synching my calories burned. I'm essentially paying premium price just to use basic features now.

I have been using MFP for a little over a month and there have been multiple instances where the app has sync issues with fitbit and logging into the server. It also likes to add 100 of the same food item that I then have to delete manually. Thankfully I don't pay for the premium version because it would not be worth it.
Was loving this app until the latest update. It has now stopped syncing to my Fitbit, in addition to being extremely slow. Please fix.
lovr it! i lost 45 lbs keeping track if calories. thanks!
Best thing to help you lose/gain weight. So easy to use. Amazing!

It was doing great until the last few days. Now it has developed a habit of duplicating entries at random. Today it added 1426 calories I had not eaten, because it duplicated one item 15 times. Same happened yesterday. It also isn't syncing with fitbit app anymore, so... that's a bit useless. If there was such a thing as support I wouldnt need to leave this review.
latest update broke the app. multiple copies of food entries and not syncing with the Fitbit app. was five stars, now one. I'm only keeping it in case they fix the issues quickly.
Took a while to learn the nuances, but now I am a fan.
Fitbit not syncing, adding a meal causes multiple additions of the meal. Please fix as it was working perfectly before.
since update, won't sync with Fitbit and adding multiple entries for meals

I've had multiple issues with this app. The latest is its not sinking with my Fitbit. The app says its connected but not tracking the calories burned from exercise vs what i've eaten. i've rebooted my phone but the issue has remained for two days. Other issue has been logged out of the app for no reason.
Great for a free app. The missing star represents the bugs that pop up from time to time and require a reinstall to fix (diary won't complete, progress stops tracking).
The complete diary feature hasn't been operable, which is the most important feature.
it's easy to use and track your progress, you have to be honest cause you'll only cheat yourself.
VERY helpful for body weight and diet goals. awesome.

Really love this app and use it every day. However, it stopped synching to my Fitbit the last two days. I see that others have the same problem. it says it's connected. I don't want to reinstall after reading comments about how it won't let you sign in afterward. please fix problem.
not syncing with my Fitbit versa lite please fix
excelent application!

App has problems ALL THE TIME! I'm so sick of it, but I haven't found another app yet that has the same set up & I hate that I'm gonna lose all my progress switching to a different app. if you wanna keep all your progress don't use this one. they can't keep up with it. it's very frustrating to use when it's messing up all the time. I type something into my food diary & it logs in the food about 30 times so I have to go through it & delete the other 29 entries. you scan something & it goes nuts.üò°
up until today this was great! now i cant access the server

worked for a while then lost connection with my Fitbit and no matter what I try I can't get it to sync up again. very frustrating. also keep duplicating my meals so it says I will have 50 of one thing!

Every few months the app will not sync with the server or my Fitbit. I've tried uninstalling the app and logging out of my online account. When I do this, my ENTIRE account is wiped out and all my food and activity logs are permanently erased. Months of tracking and hard work are gone. Seriously not impressed.

I only have the app, I dont pay for the premium package but it is still really useful. I am just trying to get back on a healthier eating lifestyle . (Fell off the wagon a bit )!!! I've been reading up on macros etc. The app will count them for you as you add your daily foods. It will also scan the barcodes and give you the info. then you can just adjust quantities if necessary. Then you can build up a list for future reference. Works well for my needs. You can also pair it, eg. to a fitbit.
Too many technical difficulties. This may be why people keep being able to hack them.
Until they fix the syncing for fitbit, which hasn't synced up properly since updating, this is staying a 1-star review. Seriously, with every update this gets worse. Fix your shit.
I am having the same issue as someone posted earlier today. The app is not syncing with my Fitbit giving me credit for my exercise and it logged in one of my foods about eight times.
Excellent site, somewhat easy to use, comprehensive food list for calories

Usually this app works very well, but for the last few days, it won't seem to sync with my Fitbit, giving me credit for my excercise there. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I have unlinked the two from one another and waited 15-20 minutes before relinking them back together. It gave me credit for my excercise but only for the 8k steps I had walked that morning, not the total 13.5k steps that I had. Zero excercise is what it said. Logged my oatmeal 10x this morning. Update available?
I love this app! When I was seriously keeping up with my fitness goals this and a few other secrets helped me out tremendously!
i am not able to sign in please help
This app has been having trouble syncing my fitbit to add my physical activities and it's making me upset! What is the problem and why is it doing this??"Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
really good at tracking food. they even have my local tiny neighborhood store. its fantastic
Is my go to for tracking nutrition and exercise. Unfortunately it has stopped interfacing with my fitbit blaze. No steps being counted and calories not adjusted.
does not sync with Fitbit
super helful to track intake
Easy to use, concise and works with a step counter...Perfect!
very helpful and user friendly
app use to be so great but now I have problems scanning and putting in items I searched. laggy. glitchy. so sad.

best app ever until the last update, 04/06/19. since then my water is not logged to my Fitbit app and my steps are not added to my Fitness Pal app. In just over 30 days you guys went from Hero to Zero.
this app really helps me watch my guidelines
All of a sudden I log in an item, and it posts it close to 65 times. I've uninstalled it and then reinstalled it & it didn't help. It also stopped keeping track of my fitbit steps.
Super easy to use - love it!
Love being able to track my intake and correlate with my goals, minute by minute.
not syncing with my fitbit app since update
I love this app.
so many issues now my food log is adding food multiple times my step tracker isnt showing

Too many ads. I used this app a couple of years ago and liked it but now it is so cluttered with ads you can't find the program. They push the premium ad free version endlessly not impressed and not worth 50 per year. Not good advertising for Under Armor either. I am going to delete it and not going back.
Love the app! Makes counting calories a whole lot easier!

Frequently crashes and runs slow. Since last update has also been duplicating my entries by itself until I'm 10,000+ calories over. When it works it's the best free calorie and activity tracker. That's a rarity now.

ever since the last update the app sucks! i enter food and it would enter it randomly through the day up to a hundred times. also when i finish my log for the day and submit it, it says there's an error. I'm paying ten bucks a month for this?

for the most part, it's great! but lately it's been bugging out. It needs a new update. My Fitbit says its connected, but it's not reading my steps, and it won't let me click on certain items or it won't appear once it has been selected. This has only been recently.

sick and tires if tge late evening network iasues with thia app. Check down detector only to find hundreds of ither reporting the same issue. I subscribe but cant see myself continuing to pay for a product that goes down so much a night. around 9 to 10pm. Seems to be some late night server issue. edit: Decided to cancel subscription.
very little help if you can't login

Horrible. constantly crashing. Always has server issues. keeps adding multiole entries of different foods. last time I opened the app it had added 45 extra line items of same food. Uninstalled, went with mymacros. no issues so far.

used this app for years on and off. Over the last couple of days it hasn't been syncing with my fitbit. I have uninstalled and reinstalled and now can't log in. I have changed the password and can log on via the web but not by the app. This is so frustrating. I have 2 weeks till my holiday and now can't keep track.
Changed from 5 to 1 stars. Two years ago when I first reviewed the app it was great. Now it crashes all the time and takes forever to link with FitBit. It's currently not loading up at all.

App used to be great, haven't been able to open it for days. Uninstall & reinstall x 5, force stop, checked all permissions, restarted phone. I hate to delete my accnt & lose all my hard work. SO DISAPPOINTING

App freezes often. Some of my diary days have many duplicate automatically loaded exercise records from samsung health. For example on one day I have 149k exercise calories. My fitness pal will not give me calorie credit for steps if I also do a biking activity. My fitness pal does not show net carbs. My phone keeps telling me this app is using took much battery.

trying my darndest to like this app have only been using for three full days...had to uninstall and reinstall yesterday because of message cannot send to server error message ...try again. went to do the daily complete my days nutrition talley and once again this message appears. i am not planning on delete and download because thats a ridiculius thing to be faced with in this application. FIX or I'm outta here!
hello! it won't let me make an account because it keeps says my email is invalid. ... but it's not so what am I suppose to do? hello still waiting for a reply please.

100 x Last food - First, synchronization with Fitbit app is lost. - Second, the application adds, by itself, 100 records of the last breakfast food. Now, I have to remove each record added for app. Today is the second day with this problem.
Will no longer sync to Fitbit after update
App stopped syncing my steps from Fitbit very annoying....please fix!
used daily
Not working today after yesterday's update. Won't add my steps and have tried uncoupling and recoupling several times.Please sort the glitch out.
all of a sudden. i can total my daily diary

I want to start off by saying that I really do like this app. It was instrumental for me when I first started trying to gain weight after a rather devastating eating disorder. after I got a new phone I forgot to add it back until now, because I'm trying to keep up a healthy BMI. But after I redownload it, the app just refuses to let me login. My email and password are both correct. I've tried restarting my phone, restarting the app, pretty much everything. But I absolutely can not login.
horrible app. been having so many issues with it. I can't even log in or recover my password. all my progress lost. sooo disappointed.
Impossible to not loss weight with this app. Give a 5 star rating when app will properly sync with my fitbit like it use to
Not compatible with fitbit always. Frustrating.
